pkgmetadata.longdescription: This is the meta-ebuild for joetoolkit utilities. It deployes basic "joetoolkit" and optionally (with USE flags) can deploy other tools, including -- "iptools," "xenvmfiles," "backup_utilities," and "utility_archive" Note that the latter is archived, depractated tools

use.flag: Install tools helpful for ip networking
Install /etc/portage files used by joetoo xen vms
Install example joetoo backup utilities (must be customized)
Pull in extra utilities that have come and gone
